Text: i liked this film in an odd way, clever film sick but clever....

Sorry but you can't really consider this movie a "..bizarre ...low budget Asian movie that Hollywood will never remake." The very well directed (Fruit Chan) and wonderfully shot (Christopher Doyle, HKSC) "Gaau Ji" it's been raped in this very bad quality rip. Seeing what was a masterpice of lighting, shooting and colouring in this very low definition 4:3 letterbox "havoc" is an insult to the work of two contemporary masters of NOT JUST IN ASIA cinema. A total waste of time and bandwidth.

@ new cinema pirate

if you are so attached to this film why didn't you take the time to upload a better version? in fact you have only one upload...says it all really
cheers arsenal and lifesux glad you enjoyed it!
Thanks for putting this up! Been wanting to watch this for a while.
